page.title: 06A past Mayor of Beverley
page.content: One of Beverley's most notable citizens is Councillor Harry Flynn.He has been the mayor three times, in 1957,1969 and in 1983. He would like to see changes in the governing body, for he thinks that all the members of the council do not come from Beverley,so they do not know much about the state of the roads and local problems. We asked him his funniest moment and he told us about the time he had to mend a broken doll in Railway Street where a childrens home used to be. He was touring around the home when a little girl with a broken doll came crying up to him. He thought that the elastic inside the arm had snapped,and as there was nothing else to do, he mended it for her. He has been to Canada,Scotland,America,Mexico,Poland, Asia,Africa and Sweden.
